titlestmt.titleproper: The family history and genealogy book of the Lambertville, New Jersey Byberry Waltons 2000-2005
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: The family history and genealogy book of the Lambertville, New Jersey Byberry Waltons
did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of seven binders of family histories and genealogies of the Byberry Walton family. Materials include: narrative histories, many focused on European royal connections of the family; maps; extensive family charts, some with photos included (charts end in the early 1970s); photographs of individuals and groups, grave markers, properties and homes, that are included within the narrative; and reproductions of illustrations from published materials. There is an index to names and a set of base pedigree charts.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
